Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Lekythos
Description: Globular lekythos endowed with a ring base, a slightly conical and a narrow neck with a trefoil orifice. A diagonal handle connects the lip with the shoulder. The exterior surface is adorned with convex striations (throwing marks).
